body_html: to add to what @jithunnair-amd said: there are currently a few more steps (with respect to dependencies) required which we are in the process of sorting out (among other things, you will need a ROCm 1.8.2). so indeed it is not production-ready yet but we are actively working on that.
body_text: to add to what @jithunnair-amd said: there are currently a few more steps (with respect to dependencies) required which we are in the process of sorting out (among other things, you will need a ROCm 1.8.2). so indeed it is not production-ready yet but we are actively working on that.
body: to add to what @jithunnair-amd said: there are currently a few more steps (with respect to dependencies) required which we are in the process of sorting out (among other things, you will need a ROCm 1.8.2). so indeed it is not production-ready yet but we are actively working on that.
